review: The Fire TV Stick was super easy to set up.  It takes up little room and I would be able to move it to another room easily.  I have both Netflix and Amazon Prime, and I am excited to be able to watch those shows on my big screen TV just like I can any other show.I know that there are other apps, I have really been focused on catching up with some favorite shows, so I haven't explored other capabilities.
author: E. Feliciano

review: About once a day on average, my TV screen is blue and I have to unplug it for 1/2 a minute to get it running again.  I also expected the search function to consolidate my Apps/streaming services (Netflix, etc..) so that I don't have to conduct multiple searches, so that was a disappointment.  Made a mistake in the beginning and ended up paying for a show through Amazon that was already included with Netflix.  Finally, missed the controller in my son's pants pocket before washing, and so, it's only working some of the time.  I have to use the phone controller app sometimes.  So, overall not a great experience, but still functional.
author: Elaine Palmquist
